short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Frequent flyer reward fare search made easy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to easily find frequent flyer reward fares without navigating away from the Qantas or Virgin Australia websites. Features at a glance:

Reward Seat Finder (Calendar View)
- 1 year lookahead searching
- Over 1,000 routes supported
- 4 cabin classes
- Optional filtering of classic plus & points plus pay fares
- One way and return trip support
- Seat count filtering

Remaining Seat Count
- Displays remaining seats for each cabin/fare class (Virgin Australia only)

Points Purchase Flights
- Displays opportunities where purchasing points, then using them to buy a reward fare can be cheaper than buying a cash fare outright

Flight Seats
